sentences.en: Amender's mother employs a personal trainer, a bodyguard, a singing coach and a councilor to look after all her fifteen-year-old daughter's needs.
sentences.cn: Amender 的母亲雇了一名私人教练、一名保镖、一名歌唱教练和一名顾问来满足她15岁女儿的一切需要。

sentences.en: You're a glorified bodyguard, that's it.
sentences.cn: 你是一个称职的保镖，仅此而已。

sentences.en: He has an all-female bodyguard contingent.
